Replying to @benmvp 2020-09-09 08:18
@benmvp @elijahmanor Netlify redirects support that behaviour. You can have as many URLs as you like redirecting or rewriting to the same resource. In fact you can respond with any http response code you like. The default (when no response code is specified) is to use a 301 redirect.
